articles.title: HHS Secretary Says U.S. Will Take 'All Steps' to Protect Americans After WHO Head Opposes Coronavirus Evacuation

articles.content:

articles.title: Christian Pastor Claims Coronavirus Is God's 'Death Angel,' Blames Parents 'Transgendering Little Children'
articles.description: "Look at the spiritual rebellion that is in this country, the hatred of God, the hatred of the Bible," Rick Wiles said.
articles.content:
